*Fall Offer: For qualifying purchases, $100 will be deducted from the purchase price before sales taxes are applied. One gift card per customer. Offer may not be applied to previous purchases, gift cards or combined with any other offer. Valid on full-price merchandise only. Excludes all Bric's luggage. Employees are not eligible. Some exclusions may apply. Offer expires November 18, 2018. Redeem in store: mention code Fall18 to your sales associate. Redeem online: enter code FALL18 at checkout.

*Free shipping for purchases and returns on most items, includes FedEx Ground Delivery only. No code required. Taxes apply to some orders. For expedited and/or shipments outside of the United States, delivery and processing charges apply. For complete delivery, shipping, and return and exchange details, including cost and delivery time, visit PaulStuart.com/shipping-information or call 866.278.8278.
